resources:
Modern Rotation Control Modern Rotation Control
Rotation Control Active Inactive (with Guard)
Deduce from current orientation Auto Portrait Portrait (Reverse) Portrait (Sensor) Landscape Landscape (Reverse) Landscape (Sensor) Refresh
Control Settings Settings — Auto Lock Timer is reset when the device is rotated. Settings — Presets Change behavior depending on the current application.
install_tile Add the Tile Click here to add the tile to the Quick Settings. ">
battery_optimization Exclude from Battery Optimization Click here to ensure that the application is never stopped. ">
configure_presets Configure per Application Set the mode depending on the application (when switching to it). Accessibility permission is required, and must be re-allowed after each update.
start_control Start controlling rotation Start this application now.
guard Prevent apps. from changing rotation This mode can prevent interaction with security prompts (e.g. APK install).
mode Rotation mode Currently set to: %s
tile_click_behavior Tile Click Behavior Change the behavior of the Quick Settings tile when pressed. Currently set to: %s
close_dialog_on_click Close Dialog on Click Close the Modes dialog after selecting one.
start_on_boot Start on Boot Automatically start the service when the device is restarted.
refresh_on_unlock Refresh on Unlock Re-apply the current rotation mode when the device is unlocked.
show_notification Show Notification Users of the Quick Settings tile probably don\'t have a need for it.
buttons Mode Buttons Select which buttons to display.
refresh_mode_delay Refresh Mode Delay Wait a %s amount of time before restoring the original rotation mode. Fast (0.2s) Normal (0.6s) Slow (1s)
auto_lock Auto Lock after some time Automatically lock the mode that corresponds to the device orientation: %s Disabled after 15 seconds after 30 seconds after 1 minute after 2 minutes Locked rotation mode to %s
auto_lock_mode Auto Lock to Mode Set to the mode: %s
auto_lock_force Force Auto Lock Forcibly apply the rotation, ignoring the current rotation. Wait until the current rotation matches the setting to lock it.
Controls Background Service Service is running.
The service will be started after selection.
Allow the application to write settings. Allow the application to overlay over other apps. Allow notifications and retry.
Accessibility Permission Required To monitor app changes, please enable accessibility service for this application. Open Settings Cancel Permission is required to properly detect when you change application.
